Articles.Content: Having only just discovered (I've already several hundred hours of playing KSP since 0.23 under my belt) that the little round thing next to the altimeter is a rate of ascent/descent gauge, it got me to wondering whether it might be possible for someone to create a mod that adds a row of basic aircraft instruments just above, or clustered a round the navball, for use when one is flying in a more aeroplane-like manner than rocket-like manner. If such a thing IS possible, I for one would be delighted! Esme
You may find [Steam Gauges](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/40730-1-0-2-SteamGauges-V1-7-0-26-May-15) adequately covers the UI elements requested
